Name: Robotnik
AboutMe:
SOreadytohelp

Programmer by day, Gamer by night. I love to tinker with things and probably break them in the process.

I'm currently venturing back into the YouTube space with a crew of the saltiest compatriots I know! Check us out!

Find me on

  • A Pinch of Salt Gaming! (YouTube)
    We play games, talk crap and get a little salty in the process.
  • Pokétown! (Facebook)
    Like Pokemon? I'm Admin Charmander (Rod) on Pokétown - a Facebook group for Pokémon everything! Battles, Trades, Breeding, Discussions, RMTs, Shiny/5 IV Giveaways and more! Join now! (Be sure to read the rules!)
  • Steam!

I'm a PC Gamer mainly, but I also dabble with my PS3 and 3DS. I prefer to play games to relax, so you won't hear me spouting scores and rankings and all that stuff. I'm Currently playing Pokemon X, and loving it.

  • Starcraft (1 and 2)
  • Crash Team Racing

  • Borderlands

  • Team Fortress 2

  • Left 4 Dead (1 & 2)
  • GTA San Andreas
  • Dawn of War 1 (Dark Crusade expansion mainly)
  • Pokemon, all generations
  • Tombi! (Tomba! in USA)

I'm right into emulation of old games & consoles (I still own the originals, but emulation is easier in this day and age)
